1.2.1.name: wordpress/dtm-ical-events-agenda
1.2.1.description:
Manage a full iCal-like Calendar within your blog. Powered by the fantastic works of Stefano Verna and Maarten Hus, now completely integrated with wordpress.

Have a look here : http://www.stefanoverna.com/wp-content/tutorials/ical_like_calendar/ .

With this plugin, you can :

  • Manage Multiple events for the same day
  • Set a start and an end date for every event
  • Events are simple : just create a post the usual way in the made-for 'Agenda' category (created automatically on plugin activation), set a start and an end date, and you're done !

Many improvment to come. leave a word on http://deliverthemessage.net/tweet/ical-wordpress-plugin
